docs.snippet: In a speech at the Union League of Philadelphia, Mr. Trump called for an end to the military spending sequester and contrasted his views with those of Hillary Clinton....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a speech at the Union League of Philadelphia, Mr. Trump called for an end to the military spending sequester and contrasted his views with those of Hillary Clinton.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump, in speech to Union League of Philadelphia, vows to significantly expand American military forces; promise comes day after Trump released endorsement letter from about 90 retired military officials; budget analysts say his plan to fund such an expansion is unrealistic.

headline.main: Donald Trump Vows to Bolster Nation’s Military Capacities
headline.print_headline: Trump Proposes Vast Expansion Of U.S. Military

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Philadelphia, and Matthew Rosenberg from Washington. Alan Rappeport contributed reporting from Washington.

docs.snippet: Many Republican groups, who either reject Mr. Trump or see his campaign as a lost cause, are instead threatening to bury Senate Democrats in negative advertising....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many Republican groups, who either reject Mr. Trump or see his campaign as a lost cause, are instead threatening to bury Senate Democrats in negative advertising.
docs.abstract: One Nation, Freedom Partners Action Fund, Chamber of Commerce and other Republican donors have abandoned party's presidential nominee Donald J Trump to instead support candidates in key Senate races, hoping to prevent Democrats from gaining control of chamber.

headline.main: Souring on Donald Trump, Republicans Pour Money Into Senate Races
headline.print_headline: Souring on Trump, Republican Donors Pour Money Into Key Senate Races

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and RACHEL SHOREY

docs.abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter accuses Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's government of attempting to influence United States presidential election; FBI is investigating whether Russia hacked Democratic National Committee computer systems; sharp public criticism heightens tension between US and Russia.
